author: Special Correspondent
text:
PSG Institutions on Monday felicitated 15 of its alumni who made a mark in their respective fields. A. Amalraj, Commissioner of Police, was present.

Those felicitated were: Mahendra Ramdass, president, COINDIA; Kavidasan, president of The Coimbatore Productivity Council; K.V. Srinivasan, chairman, CII Coimbatore Zone; O.A. Balasubramaniam, president, Coimbatore Management Association; V. Saravanan, president, The Institute of Indian Foundrymen, Coimbatore; Nithin Devaraj, chairman, The Institute of Indian Foundrymen; N. Krishna Samraj, national president, The Institute of Indian Foundrymen; Ramesh Bafna, president, CREDAI, Tamil Nadu; Vyshnnavi Anush, chairperson, FICCI Ladies Association, Coimbatore zone; Sundarrajulu, president, Codissia Trade Fair Complex; Venkatesh Nat Raj, president, Advertising Club; and D. Rajesh, president, Entrepreneurship Organization.
title: PSG felicitates its alumni
